short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Giving your team access to the information they need

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: FAQhacker gives you the ability to upload and distribute the information/knowledge to your team to make them efficient and successful. Our extension not only stores any information your team uploads but will visualize it in the systems your teams uses everyday.
